name: Forensic Medical Exams/Evidence Collection for Sexual Abuse or Assault
description: Conduct medical exams and collect evidence in sexual abuse or assault cases. The purpose of the exam for sexual assault or abuse is to: - Document the history - Examine for injuries, both acute and non-acute - Document the findings and photograph when needed - Provide testing for sexually transmitted infection and pregnancy - Treat, when appropriate, to reduce the chances of sexually transmitted infection and pregnancy - Communicate with law enforcement and child protection professionals - Foren

howToGetIt: Drop in or call in 24 hrs for intake interview - - During business hours: you can speak with a CASARC intake nurse. - After business hours: a CASARC nurse will return your call as soon as possible. Phone: (628) 206-8386
agency: Child and Adolescent Support, Advocacy & Resource Center (CASARC) SFGH
